Finding the game screen: downsmash.viewfinder¶

class downsmash.viewfinder.Viewfinder(filename, config)¶
detect_ports(scale, screen, max_error=0.06)¶

Find the approximate port locations.

detect_screen()¶

Attempt to detect the screen.

get_pct_locations(scales)¶

Detect the percent signs in a random sample of frames.

get_scale_and_screen()¶

Estimate the screen location and scale.
